tags: i headcanon that this is a nod to stephen king
bad things always happen in darry
summary: ASoIaF Question #489: In which Eddard III continues to haunt me... What story did Sansa tell Ned the night Arya disappeared and...
body:
ASoIaF Question #489: In which Eddard III continues to haunt me…

What story did Sansa tell Ned the night Arya disappeared and why did Ned not go to Robert with it? During the trial he claims he knows the truth. 

“They were not the only ones present,” Ned said. “Sansa, come here.” Ned had heard her version of the story the night Arya had vanished. He knew the truth. “Tell us what happened.” - Eddard III

Presumably she told her Father the truth, or at least i think she did, though maybe she didn’t. But if Sansa told the story to him why not go to Robert in private or even have Sansa tell Robert in private? Arya had been missing three days there was time to talk to Robert. Why wouldn’t you at least try to talk to Robert before killing Lady? 

I mean maybe the story Sansa gave Ned and the story she gave to Robert are the same, but that seems odd. Why not tell the whole truth to her father in private? Besides i dont think Ned is going to an accept an “I don’t know” or “I don’t remember” the first night his nine year old daughter has vanished into the woods and a thirteen year old boy has been ridden down by the Hound. So if he got the truth why did he wait three days to bring it up? Maybe his faith in Robert or he thought Sansa would say the same story because he did not think that a twelve year old girl would be super intimidated by the spectacle? Because he thought he would get to talk to Arya first? Because he was not thinking?

Look all i’m saying is that if Sansa told him what really happened it does not make a lot of sense (to me) for him to wait to talk to Robert. If he wanted to talk in private Robert probably would have agreed and if he still used Sansa as a witness she might have been more comfortable talking in private as opposed to a whole hall of people.

tags: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary: “There’s a cruel truth to it isn’t there? When there are two sisters so close in age, the more one becomes one thing the more...
caption:
“There’s a cruel truth to it isn’t there? When there are two sisters so close in age, the more one becomes one thing the more the other necessarily becomes the opposite and vice versa. It’s the way of things. If one is the queen, must be the source of honor and all that is good, the other necessarily becomes the focus of the most…creative malice. Evil sister.”

“No one says you’re evil.”

“Next to you i will always be evil. Feckless…lost…lesser thing.”

The Crown AU- Sansa as Elizabeth, Arya as Margret

summary: Idk about you but I really want to see Arya on the battlefield fighting the army of the dead. That would be amazing. Plus she...
question: Idk about you but I really want to see Arya on the battlefield fighting the army of the dead. That would be amazing. Plus she has that Valyrian steel knife now.
answer: I bet we will in some capacity. I expect to see her more in the fight against Cersei though. She didn’t become a faceless man for nothing.

reblog.comment: I bet we will in some capacity. I expect to see her more in the fight against Cersei though. She didn’t become a faceless man for nothing.

trail.content: I bet we will in some capacity. I expect to see her more in the fight against Cersei though. She didn’t become a faceless man for nothing.

summary:
A Game of Thrones: Illustrated Edition - Arya Stark & Jon Snow by Magali Villeneuve  
 Jon messed up her hair. “I will miss you,...
caption:
A Game of Thrones: Illustrated Edition - Arya Stark & Jon Snow by Magali Villeneuve

Jon messed up her hair. “I will miss you, little sister.”

Suddenly she looked like she was going to cry. “I wish you were coming with us.”

“Different roads sometimes lead to the same castle. Who knows?” He was feeling better now. He was not going to let himself be sad. “I better go. I’ll spend my first year on the Wall emptying chamber pots if I keep Uncle Ben waiting any longer.”

Arya ran to him for a last hug. “Put down the sword first,” Jon warned her, laughing. She set it aside almost shyly and showered him with kisses.

When he turned back at the door, she was holding it again, trying it for balance. “I almost forgot,” he told her. “All the best swords have names.”

“Like Ice,” she said. She looked at the blade in her hand. “Does this have a name? Oh, tell me.”

“Can’t you guess?” Jon teased. “Your very favorite thing.”

Arya seemed puzzled at first. Then it came to her. She was that quick. They said it together:

“Needle!”

The memory of her laughter warmed him on the long ride north. — Jon II

summary: See how when Arya became more and more of a warrior and a real badass people started to forget about her attraction to Gendry...
body: See how when Arya became more and more of a warrior and a real badass people started to forget about her attraction to Gendry and all of a sudden referred to her as being ”asexual“ and “not interested in romance“ despite having no proof of that. Because apparently being good in martial arts rules out having interest in boys. Just wait when Arya wears armor in s8 they‘ll say she has a dick not a vagina.

blog.name: fallenstacieb
blog.title: Life - A Very Crackship Blog
blog.description:
Hello everyone 😁😁 Welcome to my blog of weird and wonderful crackships!
I take new requests every Friday. 
I can choose to not do a request if there are not enough gifs of that person but other than that I'm pretty much happy with any pairings 😀😀 Or I'll put that crackship on hold for awhile if I believe more gifs will be available. if there is a quote from a book, movie, tv show or song that you want included then just let me know 😚
I own no base gifs, credits where credits due. I have major respect for those who have time to create gifs from movies/shows. You guys make it possible for us to create crackships so if I do end up using your base gifs and you want credit then just let me know ❤
Welcome to all my new followers and thank you for following this crazy blog 😘😘
Requests open Friday morning to Saturday morning.

tags: of course you shall have a cabin
summary: “Jaqen said to say the words too. Arya crossed her arms against her chest. “Valar morghulis,” she said, as loud as if she'd...
body:
“Jaqen said to say the words too. Arya crossed her arms against her chest. “Valar morghulis,” she said, as loud as if she’d known what it meant.
“Valar dohaeris,” he replied, touching his brow with two fingers. “Of course you shall have a cabin.”

 A Storm of Swords ; George R. R. Martin

reblog.comment:

summary: Arya Stark by Marc Simonetti
caption: Arya Stark by Marc Simonetti
